talk.author: did:plc:ncs4h36ce7sspxo7aimc5so2
talk.utter: There is nothing wrong with someone being supportive in their own way, especially when there's literally nothing they can do. Why are you drive by insulting someone who literally is just expressing their support in a powerless situation? It's genuinely weird that we do this now.

talk.author: did:plc:ncs4h36ce7sspxo7aimc5so2
talk.utter: It's like if someone said good morning and you screamed back "don't tell me what kind of morning to have! Shut up asshole!" Irl. You wouldn't do it, but we do that kind of thing online to each other all the time.
